Unchained Godness (sic)

Chinese-dubbed bootleg VCD of the 1958 TV film The Unchained Goddess. Powerful reconciliation of the mistranslation from “Goddess” to “Godness”. I also like the thermal-vision effect on the Chinese text.

The “similar items” on the archive page has more of this artist’s work in the style. I think it be a cool style to imitate for a rave flyer.

archive link
